posts.post_title: FS: Low Grade T205 Lot - All Cards $10-$18 w/ HOF **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following T205 lot available.  As you can see by the scans, all cards are low to low/mid-grade and are priced accordingly.  Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards.  3 or more ship for free.  Payment via any method you prefer.  Please e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] or send me a PM to reserve any cards or with questions.  Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:
Take the entire remaining lot (9 cards) for $110, or:

Bates - $14
Bell - $16
Konetchy - $15
Kroh - $14
Mattern - $13
McGraw (HOF) - $10
Payne - $15
Steinfeldt - $18
Wallace (HOF) - $10
One bump for a price drop to clear out the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
